title: Fuzzy Logic
subject: Artificial Intelligence
theory:
Handling vague concepts. 
Crisp set: Temperature > 30 is Hot (29.9 is Not). 
Fuzzy set: 30 has 0.8 membership in Hot, 0.2 in Warm. 
Reasoning with degrees of truth.

examples.code:
Air Conditioner:
If Room is 'Slightly Hot', Fan Speed 'Medium'.

real_world_use_cases.description: Adjust cycle based on 'dirtiness' of clothes.
